Row.Text: +1[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. +1[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. Wagadu Unique Influence Building. Ageless.
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture adjacency for Wonders. Wagadu Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Wagadu Unique Happiness Building. Adds Happiness to adjacent Quarters. Ageless.
Wagadu Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Dome Ka Yoroba and Yiri Senuman in the same District. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on trade routes from this city.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on trade routes from this city.
